channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tick tock: Just 3 days left to save up to $900 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 pass
item.description: Time’s almost up — save big before prices jump in 3 days! You’ve got until May 25 at 11:59 p.m. PT to save up to $900 on individual tickets to TechCru...

item.title: Shop Like a Supervillian
item.description: Villainous characters often have devilishly good taste. Put these tools to better use in your own lair.

item.title: 6 Best Webcams (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: You might see your coworkers in only two dimensions, but don’t let that stop you from looking your best.

item.title: At TechCrunch Sessions: AI, Artemis Seaford and Ion Stoica confront the ethical crisis — when AI crosses the line
item.description: As generative AI becomes faster, cheaper, and more convincing, the ethical stakes are no longer theoretical. What happens when the tools to deceive be...

item.description: In the startup world, access to cutting-edge tools isn’t the biggest obstacle — it’s knowing how to wield them with precision. At TechCrunch Sessions:...

item.title: 29 Best Memorial Day Sales on Our Favorite Gear (2025)
item.description: Save on bedding, meal kits, speakers, and more this Memorial Day weekend.

item.title: California prepares to sue feds after Senate revokes the state’s EV rule
item.description: The state was to require increasing sales of zero-emissions cars and passenger trucks starting in 2026.

item.title: Kentucky’s Bitcoin Boom Has Gone Bust

item.title: X continues to suffer bugs following Thursday outage
item.description: For over 24 hours, many X users, including this reporter, have been experiencing issues with the site’s basic functionality. Some messages won’t load,...

item.title: The Best Travel Tech for Families (2025)
item.description: Prepare for your next family trip and keep everyone online and fully charged with these WIRED travel tech tips.
